title: RIP Dominion

embed.description: We launched Dominion more than four years ago as an alternative game mode designed to challenge players with fast-paced skirmishes, capture-and-hold gameplay, and different skills to master. Back then, we truly believed the mode would introduce new players to League of Legends and provide current players with an experience as captivating as Summoner's Rift.

body: I have 97 wins, could I please get that icon? :(

replies.body: Many of us have 0 wins due to it not being available on this server...
^ never played a non custom game of it, we need more game modes not less ffs

If you're looking for game modes you're in the wrong genre of gaming.

MOBAs are very tight in their variability and don't allow much in terms of alternating gameplay.
Look at Smite though. They have many modes on permanently.

No they don't.

They have cyclic modes that are just rehashes of the same formula presented in barely different ways on one of four maps.
